name: Root of the Problem (sannedevrieze)
description:
Introduction

Get to the root of the problem! Take on the role of couples therapist and choose between a variety of questions in order to successfully reconnect the couple. But choose carefully. There are consequences to asking the wrong questions.

Key features

  • Customizable Experience
    • Choose between multiple dialogue options, resulting in various responses
  • Soft and Whimsical Visuals
    • Charming 2D characters in a cozy environment
  • A budding romance story
    • Plantiful plant puns
